tool.name: VCF Filter
tool.description: Filter VCF file based on GFF3 file and skewness parameter

param.name: skewness
param.label: Skewness parameter
param.help: The skewness parameter for filtering the VCF file. Adjust this to change the stringency of the filter.

tool.help:
**VCF Filter**
This tool filters a VCF file based on a GFF3 file and a skewness parameter. It keeps only the entries in the VCF file that have a position present in the GFF3 file and where the FAF and RAF are skewed more than the specified skewness parameter. It also adds the ID from the GFF3 file to the ID column of the VCF file.
